sub_title: Digital Marketing / PR Specialist at BIRDMAN
summary:
EXPERIENCE: 10+ years of experience in digital marketing / entertainment, advertising, planning and coordinating design & art events in Japan, Europe and the US.

Skills: Digital Media Strategy, Social Media Content Marketing & Creation, PPC, Email Marketing, Web Analytics, SEO, Video Advertising, Design Awards Entries, Public Speaking, Event Planning, Sales Operations, English/Japanese translations & subtitles (IT, design, fashion, art related.) Japanese (business/native), English (business/native), Romanian (native level).

Career highlights:
BIRDMAN (2018-2021)
- NEW NOSE | The Laundry Smell Checker - KAO Marketing/PR https://www.birdman.ne.jp/main.html#portfolio/detail/232
- COHACO | The Smart Buddhist Altar (Marketing/PR) https://www.birdman.ne.jp/main.html#portfolio/detail/237
- NEURALL JAZZ | Dentsu (Marketing/PR) https://www.birdman.ne.jp/main.html#portfolio/detail/227
- PA!GO | Panasonic, Google (Marketing/PR) https://www.birdman.ne.jp/main.html#portfolio/detail/234
daisy Inc. (2016-2018)
- Kojimachi Shoran Art Installation (Producer/Marketing/PR) https://masato.inagaki.daisy-co.com/artworks/65/
- Lazy Arms (Producer/Marketing/PR) https://masato.inagaki.daisy-co.com/artworks/64/
TOKYO DESIGN WEEK (2011-2016)
Seminars & Event Coordination/ Sales / International PR
- MIT Media Lab Special Forum 2013 http://tokyodesignweek.jp/2013/en/special/forum/mitmedialab.html
- LONDON DESIGN FESTIVAL 2014 https://www.dezeen.com/2014/09/16/tokyo-designers-week-at-tent-london-2014/ - MILANO SALONE 2014/2015 http://tokyodesignweek.jp/press_release/docs/Milano%20Press%20Release.pdf - NYCxDESIGN 2015
* Main Clients: Panasonic, KAO, Able & Partners, IBM, Dentsu, Hakuhodo, The Japanese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, teamLab, rhizomatics, NTT Data, etc.

treasury_media.title: BIRDMAN | バードマン | The Interactive Company
treasury_media.description: BIRDMAN | バードマンは最先端のデジタルプロモーションを手がける精鋭チーム。WEBサイト、アプリケーション、インスタレーションやリアルイベントなど、課題に対するアウトプットは多岐にわたる。国内外で100以上のアワードを受賞。

education.field_of_study: Japanese Language and Literature Department / Minor in American Interdisciplinary Studies
Japanese Theatre / Gender, Media, Culture Minor in American Visual Media of the 19th-20th century

profile_positions.description:
- Oversee marketing campaigns, social media management, content creation, SEO, website development and guest relations
- Manage all social media channels and public relations

Digital Marketing
- brand ambassador. Prepare, plan and manage all external digital marketing activities to maximise brand promotion
- plan, create & execute digital marketing campaigns within timescales
- develop strategies to drive online traffic to the website, utilising a range of techniques including paid search, SEO and PPC
- engage with customers through digital channels; monitor and engage with customers to resolve any issues and/ or create positive PR opportunities
- evaluate the effectiveness of all marketing activity and adjust where necessary.

Social Media Management
- oversee the social media strategy ensuring it aligns with the brand
- maximise followers on all social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, etc.
- develop a content calendar across all platforms ensuring a constant supply of relevant content
- manage Photographer/Videographer production when appropriate for content, promotions or events

Public Relations
- plan events publicity strategies & campaigns
- build and maintain strong connections with foreign design media,  planning tie-up articles.
- writing presentations & press releases 
- dealing with enquiries from the public, the press, and related organisations
- speaking publicly at interviews, press conferences & presentations
- providing clients with information about new promotional opportunities and current PR campaigns progress
- analyzing media coverage
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing / PR Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Public Relations
- planning national publicity strategies & campaigns
- planning & negotiating collaborations with prospective electronics companies for equipment rental
- writing and producing presentations & press releases
- dealing with enquiries from the public, the press, and related organisations
- building & maintaining strong connections with design & art media publications in Japan
- planning and proof-reading tie-up articles
- promotion on social media including blogs, Facebook, Twitter, etc
- speaking publicly at interviews & presentations.

Event/Content Planning & Coordination
- planning and coordinating in-house original interactive art contents
- planning and coordinating prototyping projects with prospective clients (software/hardware)
- planning  and coordinating events to participate and promote those contents

Human Resources
- coordinating summer software-engineers interns (from Stanford & Sourbonne University)
- programmers/3DCG designers recruiting and staffing (job description, interviews, scheduling)
- research and negotiate with prospective recruiting companies to post such job descriptions

International Events
- SXSW 2016, 2017 
- CES 2016

National Events 
- Karuizawa New Art Museum　"Art is Science Ⅱ Exhibition”｜ Japan ｜ 2017-2018
- Tokyo Skytree "Tokyo Solamachi” Permanent Exhibition｜ Japan ｜ 2017 
- Nagoya City Science Museum”What is a Robot Exhibition” ｜ Japan ｜ 2017
- Digital Contents Expo Tokyo ｜ Japan ｜2016, 2017
profile_positions.title: Digital PR Manager/Interactive Art Contents Producer/Event Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Event Public Relations
- planning overseas publicity strategies & campaigns (Milano Salone, London Design Festival, 
NYCxDESIGN)
- building and maintaining strong connections with foreign design media,  planning tie-up articles, inviting them to Japan to promote Japanese design. (Desigboom, Dezeen, Frame, Wallpaper, etc.)
- social media promotion
- writing presentations & press releases 
- dealing with enquiries from the public, the press, and related organisations
- organizing & attending press conferences and event tours
- speaking publicly at interviews, press conferences & presentations
- providing clients with information about new promotional opportunities and current PR campaigns progress
- analyzing media coverage

Event Content Planning & Coordination
(Promoting and Localizing Japanese design, art, visual media, fashion, food in Japan and overseas)
- developing concepts and ideas, writing proposals
- overseeing operations, directing staff, coordinating technical and production aspects.
- managing event budget 
- securing venues and equipment 
- organizing seminars, music events, workshops
- listing and approaching prospective exhibitors (sales)
- establishing professional relations with embassies in Japan to invite prospective design companies, designers and schools from different countries
- networking with other app 100 global design events to improve design communities 
- preparing documents to receive financial subsidy from the Japanese Government
- preparing events exhibition manuals, open explanatory sessions for exhibitors

TV Show Planning & Coordination
- research, negotiate and schedule interviews with possible candidates
- Jp-En Subs 

International Events
- TOKYO DESIGN WEEK  in NEW YORK ｜ 2015
- TOKYO DESIGN WEEK  MILANO｜ 2014, 2015
- TOKYO DESIGN WEEK  LONDON｜ 2014

National Events
- TOKYO DESIGN WEEK  TOKYO ｜ 2012-2015

Seminars
- MIT Media Lab Special Forum｜ 2013
- WORLD DESIGN WEEK SUMMIT ｜TOKYO, MILAN ｜ 2014, 2015

profile_positions.description:

- Organize restaurant events
